A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went into this wondering if they'd be able to do something new and different\, and they absolutely did. it's got the same bleak tone as episode 5\, but it's also so much more. definitely the deepest star wars movie to date. not everyone will get it\, as many other reviews make clear\, but that doesn't matter. the Last Jedi is an amazing movie and you need to see it right now.
